summary: I got a message for you I'm supposed to deliver, your eyes only...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/29554-1-1357511182.png[/img][/center]
Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1

JANUARY 6, 2013

1. Introduction
2: Installation
3. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

"I got a message for you I'm supposed to deliver, your eyes only..."

No matter where you are, that very same courier finds you; a young nord lad with a Cyrodiilic-style haircut with a bit of dirt on his face and scruff on his chin.

Isn't it a bit odd that he's the only courier in Skyrim?

This mod tweeks the setup for the Courier a bit, using not a single face, but a selection of four faces; the original Nord, an Imperial, a Dark Elf, and a Wood Elf. Unfortunately, only once voice type ("MaleYoungEager" AKA Boone from FONV) has voice work for the Courier, so they still all sound the same

===============
2. INSTALLATION
===============

Unpack the VariedCouriers.esp module, the meshes folder, and the textures folder into your SkyrimData folder, or use Nexus Mod Manager to square it away for you. Activate the module.


==================
3. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v1:
Initial Release.
